exceptions.tactic: intros T Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1 x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1' x0 H1 H2 H3.
intros T' Ord' s2' s1' x0' H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop t : T s2 : seq T x0 : T H : sorted Ord [:: t] H0 : sorted Ord s2 H1 : Ord (last x0 [:: t]) (head x0 s2) Unable to unify "Ord (last x0 [:: t]) (head x0 s2)" with "match s2 with | [::] => True | h1 :: _ => Ord t h1 /\\ sorted Ord s2 end".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment T : Type Ord : T -> T -> Prop t, t0 : T s1, s2 : seq T x0 : T H : sorted Ord [:: t, t0 & s1] H0 : sorted Ord s2 H1 : Ord (last x0 [:: t, t0 & s1]) (head x0 s2) Unable to unify "Ord (last x0 [:: t, t0 & s1]) (head x0 s2)" with "match s1 ++ s2 with | [::] => True | h1 :: _ => Ord t0 h1 /\\ sorted Ord (s1 ++ s2) end".
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros T Ord s2 s1 x0 H1 H2 H3. unfold sorted in H1, H2. destruct s1. - simpl. apply H2. - destruct s1. + simpl. apply H1. + simpl. apply and_comm. split. * apply H1. * apply H3.
